Consolidated Net Sales:₹1,016.34 crore, a decrease of 22.18% year-over-year.

Standalone Net Sales:₹124.86 crore, an increase of 8.01% year-over-year.

The Board of Directors recommended a final dividend of ₹2.50 per equity share (125%) for the financial year ending March 31, 2025. This is subject to shareholder approval at the Annual General Meeting.

April 30, 2025:Board meeting held where audited financial results for the quarter and year ending March 31, 2025, were approved. Re-appointment of internal auditors and appointment of a secretarial auditor were also approved.

May 1, 2025:Earnings conference call scheduled to discuss the financial results for the year ended March 31, 2025.
